Trilinear Forms with Double Kloosterman Sums

Igor E. Shparlinski Department of Pure Mathematics, University of New South Wales, Sydney, NSW 2052, Australia igor.shparlinski@unsw.edu.au
Abstract.

We obtain several estimates for trilinear form with double Kloosterman sums. In particular, these bounds show the existence of nontrivial cancellations between such sums.

Key words and phrases:
Double Kloosterman sum, cancellation, trilinear form
2010 Mathematics Subject Classification:
11D79, 11L07
This work was supported by ARC GrantÂ DP170100786.

Lemma 2.3.
